sense.def: Alternative Names pan chang qi 盤腸氣 , twisted intestine qi; pan chang tong 盤腸痛 , twisted intestine pain. Pathological Condition of children experiencing an excruciating abdominal pain causing them to bend their back, cry and emit cold sweat. XEWSZWLF 14: 更有一證，發則 腹中撮痛，乾啼無淚，腰曲背弓，上唇乾額上有汗，此名盤腸內吊之痛 , “There is one more condition. When it appears there is a pinching pain in the abdomen, with dry crying without tears. The lower back is bent. The upper lip is dry, and sweat leaves from the forehead. This is called ‘the pain of twisted intestine hauled internally ’ ”.
